title: typo in src/pkg/encoding/binary/binary_test.go
body:
by **moshevds**: 
The little-endian error report is wrong on line 84:

t.Errorf("Read big-endian:\n\thave %+v\n\twant %+v", sl, s)
should be:
t.Errorf("Read little-endian:\n\thave %+v\n\twant %+v", sl, s)
Attachments: 1. binary_test_typo.patch (446 bytes)
